::KitKat::

She shot at Airbomber again.  She stood out and took a few steps 
closer to the doorway and took a clear shot at Airbomber.  She shot 
aiming for his head.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> DrillBit heard her say she loved him. He liked hearing that, but he 
was
> a little worryed about her. Why did she say it like that, in 
battle, was
> she planing something, that was going to hurt her? 
> "And you know I love you." He said.
> "Dont let them get to you. Stay behind the iron door for cover."
